exercises.title: Clean Sprint
exercises.text: Type calmly and cleanly. No spikes—steady cadence. Convert speed with accuracy.

exercises.title: Punctuation Snap
exercises.text: Fast, but precise: spacing and punctuation are still errors if missed.

exercises.title: Targets
exercises.text: Targets: 95% accuracy, 45+ WPM, and fewer than 12 backspaces.

exercises.title: Work Notes
exercises.text: Notes: finalize the rollout by Wednesday; share updates by 3:00 PM; flag blockers early.

exercises.title: Tempo Hold
exercises.text: Stay on tempo. No surges. Keep the cadence steady through the finish.

exercises.title: Dash Discipline
exercises.text: Speed is good, but clean entries win. Lock spacing, then accelerate.
